skills.name: Place value, naming and rounding whole numbers
skills.description: Place value to millions, compare, order, word names, Roman numerals and rounding; includes even/odd rules.

templates.stem: Write the number {n} in words.
Round {n} to the nearest thousand.

skills.name: Whole number operations and estimation
skills.description: Add, subtract, multiply and divide whole numbers; properties, missing digits, inequalities, mixed operations and estimation.

templates.stem: Calculate: {a} + {b} - {c}
Estimate: {a} × {b} by rounding each number to the nearest ten.

skills.name: Exponents and number theory
skills.description: Basic exponents, powers, factors, primes, divisibility, prime factorisation, HCF and LCM.

templates.stem: Evaluate: {a}^{p}.
What is the highest common factor (HCF) of {a} and {b}?

skills.name: Fractions and mixed numbers
skills.description: Understand, compare and create equivalent fractions and mixed numbers; convert, round and find fractions of wholes and groups.

templates.stem: Simplify the fraction {num}/{den}.
A group has {total} students. {num}/{den} of them like football. How many students is that? (Round your answer to the nearest whole student.)

skills.name: Add and subtract fractions and mixed numbers
skills.description: Add and subtract fractions and mixed numbers with like and related denominators, estimate and use inequalities.

templates.stem: Calculate: {a}/{b} + {c}/{b}.
Calculate: {w1} {a}/{b} − {w2} {c}/{b}.

skills.name: Decimals and decimal operations
skills.description: Understand, compare and convert decimals and fractions; add, subtract, multiply and divide decimals; estimate and compare.

templates.stem: Calculate: {x} + {y}.
Convert the decimal {x} to a fraction in simplest form.

skills.name: Percents basics
skills.description: Understand percents, convert between percents and fractions, and find percent of a number.

templates.stem: What is {p}% of {n}?
Write {p}% as a fraction in simplest form.

skills.name: Money and financial literacy
skills.description: Work with money amounts, unit prices, change, and simple budgets and records.

templates.stem: An item costs ${price} and you pay with ${paid}. How much change should you receive?
You earn ${income} and spend ${spend}. What is your balance?

skills.name: Number sequences and simple equations
skills.description: Complete arithmetic and geometric sequences and solve one-step equations; use simple two-variable tables and graphs.

templates.stem: The sequence increases by {step} each time. The first term is {first}. What is the 5th term?
Solve the equation: x + {a} = {b}.

skills.name: Time, schedules and elapsed time
skills.description: Convert time units, find elapsed time, and interpret schedules and timelines.

templates.stem: A movie starts at {start} and ends at {end}. How many minutes long is it?

skills.name: Metric measurement and temperature
skills.description: Choose appropriate metric units and convert between length, mass and volume units; reason about temperature.

templates.stem: Convert {cm} centimetres to metres.

skills.name: 2D and 3D shapes, symmetry and measurement
skills.description: Identify polygons and 3D shapes, work with angles, symmetry, perimeter, area and volume of cubes and rectangular prisms.

templates.stem: Find the area of a rectangle with length {l} cm and width {w} cm.
A rectangular prism has length {l} cm, width {w} cm and height {h} cm. What is its volume?

skills.name: Data, graphs, statistics and probability
skills.description: Read and create common graphs, calculate mean/median/mode, and work with simple probability and combinations.

templates.stem: A bag has {r} red and {b} blue counters. What is the probability of picking a red counter?
What is the mean of {a}, {b}, and {c}?
Find the area of a composite shape made of a rectangle {l}×{w} cm and a triangle with base {b} cm and height {h} cm.
Two angles are vertically opposite. If one is {a}°, what is the other?
Find the complement of {a}°.
Find the volume of a triangular prism with base area {a} cm² and height {h} cm.

skills.name: Rotational symmetry
skills.description: Identify the order of rotational symmetry for regular shapes.

templates.stem: What is the order of rotational symmetry of a square?
What is the order of rotational symmetry of a regular {shape}?

skills.name: Stem-and-leaf plots
skills.description: Read and interpret stem-and-leaf plots to find frequencies and statistics.

templates.stem: The stem-and-leaf plot shows test scores. How many students scored in the 80s?
From the stem-and-leaf plot of ages, what is the age of the oldest person?

skills.description: Interpret histograms and read bin counts from bar heights.

templates.stem: The histogram shows the heights of students. How many students are in the {targetBinLabel} cm bin?

skills.name: Probability with replacement
skills.description: Compute probabilities for sequential events when outcomes are replaced.

templates.stem: A bag has {r} red and {b} blue marbles. You pick one, put it back, then pick another. What is P(red, then red)?

templates.stem: In a class of 30, {s} students play Sport, {m} play Music, and {b} play both. How many students play Sport only?

templates.stem: Jamal estimates {a} + {b} by rounding each number to the nearest ten. What estimate does he get?
